en.pressContinue: Press the next button to continue.
en.sve_msg_prompt: Would you like to save and continue the game, or save and quit the game?
en.mmu_msg_prompt: Would you like to return to the title screen? You will lose all unsaved progress.
en.mnu_controls_desc: The entire game is controlled via the left mouse button/touch.
en.btl_msg_mve_moveCritical: The move hit, and it did critical damage!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveNoEnergy: {0} does not have enough energy to use their move!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveNoEnergy_alt00: The player does not have enough energy to use their move!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveNoEnergy_alt01: The opponent does not have enough energy to use their move!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatInc_alt00: The move increased the player's stats!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatInc_alt01: The move increased the opponent's stats!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatDec_alt00: The move decreased the player's stats!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatDec_alt01: The move decreased the opponent's stats!
en.btl_msg_mve_runFailed_alt00: The player failed to run away!
en.btl_msg_mve_runFailed_alt01: The opponent failed to run away!
en.btl_msg_treasure:
There is a treasure chest in this room.
Do you want to open it now?
en.btl_msg_paralyzed_alt00: The player is immobilized, and can't move!
en.btl_msg_paralyzed_alt01: The opponent is immobilized, and can't move!
en.btl_msg_battleWon: The player has won the battle!
en.btl_msg_battleWonBoss: The player has beaten the final boss!
en.btl_msg_battleLost: The player has lost the battle!
en.btl_msg_openTreasure: The player has opened the treasure!
en.btl_msg_levelUp: The player got a level up!
en.btl_msg_learnMove: The player is trying to learn a new move!
en.btl_msg_learnMoveYes_alt: The player learned the new move!
en.btl_msg_learnMoveNo_alt: The player did not learn the new move!
en.mve_run_dsc: The user attempts to run away. There is a 50% chance of success.
en.mve_charge_dsc: The user charges their energy by 40%.
en.mve_poke_dsc: An attack that has a 40% critical hit chance, and a 5% chance of raising the user's defense by 1 stage.
en.mve_slimeShot_dsc: An attack that has a 15% chance of lowering the target's speed by 1 stage.
en.mve_fireShot_dsc: A weak fire attack with a burn chance of 20%.
en.mve_elecShot_dsc: A weak electric attack with a paralysis chance of 20%.
en.mve_screech_dsc: A weak attack that has a 15% chance of lowering the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
en.mve_slam_dsc: An attack that has a critical hit chance of 60%.
en.mve_chip_dsc: A weak attack that always goes first.
en.mve_toss_dsc: The user raises their accuracy by 1.
en.mve_magnify_dsc: The user raises their accuracy by 1.
en.mve_heal_dsc: The user heals 15% of their health.
en.mve_hpDrain1_dsc: The user attacks the target, and restores their health by 12.5% of the damage given.
en.mve_healthSplit_dsc: The user and the target add together their proportional health, then split said health evenly between themselves.
en.mve_pushBack_dsc: The user pushes the target back, which has a 20% chance of increasing the user's defense.
en.mve_fireBurst_dsc: A decent fire attack that has a 35% chance of burning the target.
en.mve_elecBurst_dsc: A decent electric attack that has a 35% chance of paralyzing the target.
en.mve_soundWave_dsc: A decent attack that has a 20% chance of lowering the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
en.mve_magnet_dsc: The user increases their accuracy by 1 stage, and the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
en.mve_torch_dsc: A weak attack that always burns the target.
en.mve_electrify_dsc: A weak attack that always paralyzes the target.
en.mve_motivate_dsc: The user increases their attack, defense, and speed by 1 stage. This move will always go last.
en.mve_quickBurst_dsc: The user does a quick move that always goes first. This move will deal 15% of its damage dealt back to the user.
en.mve_hpDrain2_dsc: The user attacks the target, gaining 25% of the damage dealt as health.
en.mve_statClear_dsc: The user resets all stat changes for themselves and their opponent.
en.mve_cure_dsc: The user removes all their status ailments.
en.mve_risk_dsc: The user increases their attack by 2 stages and accuracy by 1 stage, but lowers their defense by 1 stage.
en.mve_tidalWave_dsc: The user hits the target with a strong attack that never misses.
en.mve_wham_dsc: The user hits the target with a decent, basic attack.
en.mve_fireBlast_dsc: A strong fire blast with a 50% chance of burning the target.
en.mve_elecBlast_dsc: A strong electric blast with a 50% chance of paralyzing the target.
en.mve_sonicWave_dsc: A strong attack that has a 25% chance of lowering the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
en.mve_hpDrain3_dsc: The user attacks the target, gaining 40% of the damage dealt as health.
en.mve_twister_dsc: The user attacks the target, lowering the target's defense by 1 stage.
en.mve_waterBlast_dsc: The user attacks the target. This move has a 30% chance of lowering the target's attack by 1 stage.
en.mve_rockBlast_dsc: The user attacks the target. This move has a 30% chance of lowering the target's defense by 1 stage.
en.mve_airBlast_dsc: The user attacks the target. This move has a 30% of lowering the target's speed by 1 stage.
en.mve_quake_dsc: The user hits the target with a strong move. The move has a critical chance of 30%, and deals 40% in damage back to the user.
en.mve_chargeSun_dsc: The user uses all their energy to perform this move. The less energy used, the weaker the move becomes. This move has a burn chance of 35%.
en.mve_chargeMoon_dsc: The user uses all their energy to perform this move. The less energy used, the weaker the move becomes. This move has a paralysis chance of 35%.
en.mve_earlyBurst_dsc: A move that gets weaker the longer the battle goes on.
en.mve_allOut_dsc: A move that lowers the user's attack stat everytime it's used.
en.switchMoveMessage: Switch out for a new move?
en.trl_intro_00: Welcome to the simulation game, Battle Bot!
en.trl_intro_01: Your job is to beat the boss of the simulation.
en.trl_intro_02: But first, I'd recommend you do some smaller battles to level-up and get new moves.
en.trl_intro_03: To the left is your health, which causes a game over if it hits 0.
en.trl_intro_04: To the right is your energy, which is needed to perform moves.
en.trl_intro_05: That will be explained more when you get into battle.
en.trl_intro_06: Speaking of which, click or touch an unlocked door to enter it.
en.trl_intro_07: The rest of the rooms will be unlocked once you clear a battle.
en.trl_battle_00: Welcome to the battle phase of the game!
en.trl_battle_01: Your job is to make your opponent's health hit 0.
en.trl_battle_02: If your health hits 0 then you will get a game over.
en.trl_battle_03: To attack your opponent, select one of your moves.
en.trl_battle_04: You can hold up to 4 moves at a time, and might be able to get a new move when you level-up.
en.trl_battle_05: If you don't have enough energy to perform a move it will be unavailable.
en.trl_battle_06: You'll need to hit the charge option to gain energy, which takes a turn.
en.trl_battle_07: You can also try your hand at running away if you wish to retreat, but it may fail.
en.trl_treasure_01: You get a free level-up, health restore, and energy restore if you collect the treasure.
en.trl_treasure_02: If you leave the treasure you can come back and open it later.
en.trl_overworld_00: Now that you've attempted a room, the final boss room is now open.
en.trl_overworld_01: The game ends when you beat the boss, so clear as many rooms as you think you need.
en.trl_overworld_02: The more rooms you clear the stronger you'll become.
en.trl_overworld_03: Enemies will get stronger the longer the game goes on, so keep that in mind.
en.trl_boss01: All you need is to beat the boss to win the game!
en.trl_gameOver_01: All living enemies have had their health and energy restored.
en.trl_gameOver_02: Your health and energy have also been restored, but your moves have been randomized.

jp.readyToPlay: あなたは遊ぶ準備ができていますか？
jp.pressContinue: 続行するには '次へ'ボタンを押してください。
